sense.def:
Humour
je sposobnost, da opazimo, kdaj je nekaj smešno, in da pripovedujemo zabavne stvari.

seg.quote: He appealed to them with his direct style and wry humour.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
has humour
, je smešno in nas spravlja v smeh.

seg.quote: She could appreciate the humour of the remark.

sense.def:
To be in a good humour
pomeni počutiti se srečnega in veselega.

seg.quote: The work was proceeding with efficiency and good humour.

sense.def:
To humour someone
pomeni potruditi se, da bi nekomu, ki se čudno vede, ugodili, da se ne bi razburil.
ugoditi, ustreči
He had bought it to humour Julie.
